solution_line_template: One pound of mangoes cost ${cost_per_half_pound} x {multiplier} = $<<{cost_per_half_pound}*{multiplier}={cost_per_pound}>>{cost_per_pound}.
So Kelly can buy ${total_money}/${cost_per_pound} = <<{total_money}/{cost_per_pound}={pounds_bought}>>{pounds_bought} pounds of mangoes.
